    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkDevice

        public NetworkDevice​(java.lang.String label)
        Constructor for a dummy network device in support of the video alias list
        Parameters:
        label - the label to use for the dummy network device which is also used as the interface name.

      • NetworkDevice

        public NetworkDevice​(@NonNull
                     java.lang.String label,
                     @NonNull
                     NetworkManagerLite.NetworkDevice.Type[] types,
                     @NonNull
                     NetworkManagerLite.NetworkDevice.Configuration c,
                     java.lang.String interfaceName,
                     java.lang.String prefAddress,
                     java.lang.String prefNetmask,
                     java.lang.String prefGateway,
                     boolean prefCreateDefaultRoute,
                     boolean disabled)
        Construct a network device which contains the current mapping information for the best identifying the device.
        Parameters:
        label - the label for the device
        types - the types of traffic supported
        c - the configuration type
        interfaceName - the name of the interface
        prefAddress - the preferred address when used in static configuration
        prefNetmask - the preferred netmask when used in static configuration
        prefGateway - the preferred gateway when used in static configuration
        prefCreateDefaultRoute - if a default route should be created.
        disabled - if the network device has been manually disabled by the user

        Test to see if the type is supported.
        Parameters:
        t - the type
        Returns:
        true if the type is supported, false if not.
